1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Gunther is pouring Rachel coffee.

lines.Line:
(In his head) <i>Say Rachel, I was wondering if you’d like to go
to a movie with me sometime. As my lover! Nnnsch, to out there. Maybe you’d just like
to ah, get something to eat with me sometime? As my lover.</i
Hi! All right, let’s go shoppin’!
Um, y'know, before we go ah, there’s something I need to say

I’ve kinda of had this ah, this crush on you. (Rachel is shocked) But
since you were with Ross, I-I didn’t do anything about it. But, now that you’re
not, I’d really like to ask you out sometime. So-so that’s-that’s what
I’m doing, now

lines.Character: (Gunther gets this hurt expression on his face and goes into the back roo
lines.Line: Gunther gets this hurt expression on his face and goes into the back room

lines.Character:
(She’s interrupted by a loud crash and the sound of braking dishes. Followed
quickly by another crash. Everyone turns and looks at the back room, as Gunther emerges
lines.Line:
She’s interrupted by a loud crash and the sound of braking dishes. Followed
quickly by another crash. Everyone turns and looks at the back room, as Gunther emerges.

2.SceneDescription: A Theatre, Joey is arriving to rehearse the play he’s in.

lines.Line:
Good. (He sets his stuff down and starts talking to Kate, another cast
member.) Hey
Oh, so you’re playing Adrienne, huh
Yes. Are you one of the retarded cousins
Oh, no. Ah, I playing your husband, Victor. I’m Joey Tribianni
Hi, nice to meet you. Kate Miller.
Hi, nice to meet you. Kate Miller.
Hi, nice to meet you. Kate Miller.

lines.Character:
(She goes over to the snack table, and Joey quickly runs over and pours her a cup of
coffee
lines.Line:
She goes over to the snack table, and Joey quickly runs over and pours her a cup of
coffee.
So the ah, play’s pretty great, huh

Oh, yeah. I love Jennifer Van Murray’s work. She’s so
brilliantly incisive when it comes to deconstructing the psyche of the American middle
class
Oh, forget about it. She rocks
Oh, forget about it. She rocks
Oh, forget about it. She rocks
Where do I know you from
Dr. Drake Remoray. Days of Our Lives. Voted most datable neurosurgeon by Teen Beat

No, that’s not it. So, you’re a soap actor? Well this must be
pretty exciting for you to be in a real play, hmm
Hey, I’ve done plays before. I’m a serious actor
Hey, I’ve done plays before. I’m a serious actor

That info-mercial! For the milk carton spout thing!
You’re-you’re-you’re the guy that doesn’t know how to pour milk!

See, I actually can pour milk, but I got you believing that I
couldn’t. Now, see, that’s acting

3.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Joey is telling Chandler about Kate.

lines.Line:
I hate this woman!! I hate her! She told everyone in the company about
that info-mercial, and now they all keep asking me to open their drinks. Okay, and
whenever I can’t do it, they’re all like-like laughing at me
So Rachel called. Wants to see me. Going over in a minute
Wow, what-what do you think she wants

Well, maybe the crazy fog has lifted and she realises that life without
me.... a-sucks

It’s possible. You are very loveable, I’d miss you if I
broke up with you. (Ross glares at him) I was just trying to be supportive
Then be supportive like a guy
Then be supportive like a guy
Then be supportive like a guy
(in a deep voice) If I broke up with you, I’d miss you

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, the gang minus Rachel and Ross are talking to Pete.

lines.Line: So, you’re like a zillionaire? (Pete smiles and nods
And you’re our age. You’re our age

Y'know what, you should like, you should buy a state and then just name
it after yourself
Oh, oh, I got it! Pete-Chicago
Oh, oh, I got it! Pete-Chicago
I got to go, so ah, I’ll see you guys later
(to Monica, by the door) So ah, we on for tomorrow

Absolutely! (He goes to kiss her, but she stops him and rubs his head
and says...) Now get out of here you!! (Pete leaves) (to the gang) Okay, I’m running
out of places I can touch him! Look, is there something wrong with me? I mean why am I
only attracted to guys where there’s no future? Either they’re too old, or
they’re too young, and then there’s Pete who’s-who’s crazy about me,
and who’s absolutely perfect for me, and there’s like zip going on! I mean,
seriously, does it sound like something’s wrong with me?

5.SceneDescription: The Hallway, Chandler and Ross are returning from working out.

lines.Line:
I can blow dry it. I can put gel on it. It doesn’t matter, I
still wind up with this little (pats the flat spot on the back of his head) cowlicky thing
on the middle part of my head. It’s so annoying. Does it bug you

lines.Character:
[Rachel comes out of her apartment, followed by Mark, and they leave on their date,
without saying a word to Ross. Ross is stunned
lines.Line:
Rachel comes out of her apartment, followed by Mark, and they leave on their date,
without saying a word to Ross. Ross is stunned.
Is there any chance you didn’t see that

6.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is pouring Mark some coffee.

lines.Line: Why do all you’re coffee mugs have numbers on the bottom

Oh. That’s so Monica can keep track. That way if one on them is
missing, she can be like, ‘Where’s number 27?!

lines.Character:
(She sits down, and Mark leans over and kisses her. Rachel doesn’t react. He tries
it again, and Rachel jumps back quickly
lines.Line:
She sits down, and Mark leans over and kisses her. Rachel doesn’t react. He tries
it again, and Rachel jumps back quickly.
No. And I don’t think I’m gonna want to
Yep. Yep, that’s what I didn’t want to know

Well, oh, Mark, I’m doing this for the wrong reasons, y'know?
I’m just doing it to get back at Ross. I’m sorry, it’s not very fair to
you

Ahh! Fair, schmair! Y'know? Look, if you want to get back at Ross, I am
here for you. Really? No-no, I say-I say, I say we get back at him right on this couch.
Right here
Oh God. I’m sorry about this
Oh God. I’m sorry about this
Oh God. I’m sorry about this
Yeah. I can just go home and get back at him by myself

7.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is sitting in one of the black chairs, and turns
to face the other one.

lines.Line:
I don’t think this town is big enough for both of us to relax in.
(He blows on his hand) Draw!! (He quickly pulls the lever to raise the foot rest, like a
gunfighter in a Western.)

(to Joey) I wasn’t doing anything. (Joey starts angrily throwing
his stuff down.) Uh-oh, what did she do now

Just because she went to Yale drama, she thinks she’s like the
greatest actress since, since, sliced bread
Ah, Sliced Bread, a wonderful Lady MacBeth
Ah, Sliced Bread, a wonderful Lady MacBeth

God, I just, I hate her! I hate her!! With her, ‘Oh, I’m so
talented.’ and ‘Oh, I’m so pretty,’ and ‘Ooh, I smell so
good.
I think somebody has a crush on somebody
Hey, Chandler, can we please stay focused on my problem here?! Y'know
I’m talking about you. You big, big freak
I’m talking about you. You big, big freak
Oh. (realises) Ohh. Ohh, you’re out of your mind

Hey, you have nothing but talk about her for the last 48 hours! If you
were in a school yard you’d be pulling her pigtails and pushing her down now

Oh, yeah?! Then how come I keep thinking about her in all these sexual
scenarios and stuff huh?

8.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, Monica is in the kitchen chopping vegetables. Chandler and
Phoebe are sitting in the living room.

lines.Line:
(to Chandler) Hey! (Chandler looks up, startled) Why isn’t it
Spiderman? Y’know like Goldman, Silverman..

No, it’s not like, like Phil Spiderman. He’s a spider, man.
Y'know like ah, like Goldman is a last name, but there’s no Gold Man
Oh, okay. There should be Gold Man
Oh, okay. There should be Gold Man
Oh, great. Although I did sit down where there wasn’t a chair
By the way, Ross dropped by a box of your stuff
By the way, Ross dropped by a box of your stuff

Oh, well, I guess I had that one coming. I’m just gonna throw it
out, it’s probably just a bunch of shampoo and... (she opens the box and stops

(She takes the T-shirt out of the box and holds it to her chest and take
a deep breath.) No. Nothing. (She smiles and goes into her room.
